name: Hearth (Matthew Allen)
description:
Hearth is a contemplative, single player experience about a group of strangers around a campfire in the wilderness and the idea that home can be anywhere if you're not alone.

Simply drag wood to the fire to keep it burning. The longer it burns, the more people will share. Experience the lives of those around the campfire through their stories

This game was made in 5 weeks as an explorational artistic experience.
